summary:
Urban manager with a specialization in Economics and a master's degree in Urban Management, Sustainability, and Climate Change. I possess a holistic approach that enables me to analyze, develop, and address challenges in a unique manner. With seven years of experience in diverse fields spanning the private and public sectors, I have gained a comprehensive perspective.

Throughout my career, I have worked on various topics, including sustainable mobility, socio-economic and financial assessment, risk assessment, project evaluation, research, urban planning, and sustainability from different stakeholder viewpoints. This breadth of experience equips me with a well-rounded approach to tackling challenges, problems, and projects.

Currently, my primary focus is on enhancing people's quality of life sustainably, while considering the adverse impacts of climate change resulting from population growth and resource scarcity. To overcome these challenges, it is crucial to develop, manage, and analyze financial tools and instruments that unlock and encourage financial support for implementing projects that address global issues.

I am a disciplined, optimistic, adaptable, and creative individual who thrives on continuous learning. I am motivated by challenges, strive to achieve goals, and consistently deliver outstanding results.


#Sustainability #Consultancy #Climate change #urbandevelopment

education.degree_name: Mater´s in Urban Management and Development - Environment, Sustainability, and Climate Change

education.field_of_study: Internacionalización de Ciudades:Oportunidad Estratégica para el Desarrollo Territorial

profile_positions.description:
Main objective: Assist the Circle Finance Program with several projects such as the International Financial Institutions Circularity Network Exchange (IFI-CEN) and the Coalition Circular Accounting (CCA). 
* Deep understanding of the scope of CSRD related mainly to circularity. 
* Gaining a close approach to the way of conducting materiality assessments, understanding double materiality, and involving stakeholders during the process.
* Understand the significance of the involvement of international financial institutions in driving the transition towards a circular economy
* Understand the main challenges and opportunities of the circular economy for businesses, cities, and governments
*Deep understanding of the Circular City Actions Framework (rethink, regenerate, reduce, reuse, and recover)
* Study different approaches and strategies for promoting circularity at a national level
* Policy and financial de-risking instruments.
profile_positions.title: Finance Intern

profile_positions.description: Urban  Environment, Sustainability, and Climate Change
profile_positions.title: MSc Candidate Urban Management and Development at IHS

profile_positions.description:
- Objective: To provide management and technical assistance to territorial entities for the improvement of processes, planning, and adjustments on infrastructure, environmental, territorial planning, basic sanitation, and social benefit projects to be financed with resources from the General Royalties System (SGR).

Specific objectives and tasks:
•	Evaluate and manage projects within territorial entities in two regions of Colombia. 
•	Provide technical, development, and financial support for the elaboration of local projects.
•	 Support local entities in developing and formulating projects that generate positive impacts for social, economic, and environmental domains. 
•	Make technical, methodological, and financial recommendations on the formulation, development, and implementation of projects that can be financed with resources from the General Royalties System.
profile_positions.title: Municipal consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Objective: To provide management, development, and technical support in local projects.

1. Pre-feasibility and feasibility of "Bicycle track Fifth Centennial". (April 2018 – March 2019)
- Sustainable urban transport project - 25 km. 
- Improve adjacent areas of the project and connect with the urban projects and plans developed and formulated within the city.
- Encourage cycling through an innovative cycle path
 Specific objectives and tasks:
•	Project manager supporting the development of the thirteen components of the study.
•	Support the management of meetings with the stakeholders 
•	Developed maps (using Arcgis), presentations, and reports for the client.
•	Provided support for all 13 components, including information gathering, fieldwork, mapping, and data analysis
•	I led the risk component for the pre-feasibility and feasibility phase, as well as the socio-economic and financial evaluation for the feasibility phase. For the evaluation, I calculated the current and potential benefits in terms of reducing travel time, road fatalities, CO2 emissions, health economic assessment, and operating costs.
•	Provide recommendations to the Mobility Entity

2. Regional connectivity for the City-Region Airport project (El Dorado, El Dorado II, and Guaymaral) Conducted in-depth studies and designs to formulate comprehensive guidelines, recommendations, and design interventions.

Specific objectives and tasks:
•	Support project managing, overseeing the development of six key components of the study. 
•	Conducted meetings with stakeholders involved in the project, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.
•	Produce maps, presentations, and reports.
•	Provided support to the six components with relevant information, fieldwork, maps, data analysis, and other necessary resources. 
•	Took the lead in the socio-economic component, defining the study area, analyzing population growth trends, and assessing land uses and the regional economy.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Objective: To develop a comprehensive framework that integrates social, economic, and environmental domains to enhance Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR).

Specific objectives and tasks:
•	Conducted a Bootcamp in collaboration with the innovative team at Bancolombia bank, to facilitate brainstorming and ideation sessions focusing on the economic, social, and environmental domains for the development of campaigns, programs, plans, and strategies aimed at enhancing employee well-being, promoting sustainability, and increasing profitability while adhering to legal frameworks.
•	Developed plans and programs aligned with the principles of well-being, social inclusion, respect, quality of life, gender equality, and non-discrimination.
•	For the environmental domain, developed campaigns and initiatives that promote the principles of reuse, recycling, waste reduction, and sustainable procurement practices.
•	For the economic domain, developed strategies aimed at increasing profitability and compliance with legal requirements
profile_positions.title: Corporate Social Responsibility project – Support

profile_positions.description:
Objective: Analysis of qualitative and quantitative factors influencing population growth in Bogotá. 
Specific objectives and tasks:
•	Conduct an analysis of urban policies and their impact on the population growth of Bogotá
•	Organize and facilitate meetings with subject matter experts to discuss and analyze the implications and impacts of population growth in the city.
profile_positions.title: Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Objective: To spearhead the development of a novel risk prevention methodology that integrates an analysis of urban environments.
Specific objectives and tasks:
•	To enhance the value proposition for clients. 
•	To generate comprehensive reports that identify risks and propose measures for improvement.
•	To conduct an in-depth analysis of potential risks for clients arising from urban dynamics.
•	To establish processes and teams, define goals, delineate responsibilities, and establish performance metrics.
•	To present the findings and intervention plan.
profile_positions.title: Leader of the risk area in urban environments

profile_positions.description:
Objective: To contribute to the development of the pedestrianization project of Seventh Avenue.
Specific objectives and tasks:
•	Conduct fieldwork to gather information on land uses and assess affected areas. 
•	Conduct interviews with stakeholders to collect relevant information. 
•	Develop maps using GIS technology. 
•	Assess the social, economic, and architectural impact of the project. 
•	Support the development of the historical context of the study area.
profile_positions.title: Practitioner

profile_positions.description:
- Objective: Development and implementation of the Strategic Road Safety Plan aimed at reducing the accident rate.
Specific objectives and tasks:
•	Implementation of the Strategic Road Safety Plan
•	Creating a culture of road safety awareness among the employees
•	Managing and conducting workshops and training sessions 
•	Developing a comprehensive risk matrix covering all means of transportation
•	Conducting a road vulnerability study for all the employees
•	Establishing processes and work teams to set goals, define responsibilities, and establish management indicators.
profile_positions.title: Leader in the Strategic Road Safety Plan
